author: hustla187
title: Ugly
review: This is the ugliest Galidor figure ever! The mask looks cheesy and has purple shoes. The weapon looks like a lantern and useless in the battlefield. If you want this set, you are making a really bad choice.

author: Risebell
title: A fantastic leap into the mysterious and unknown potential of constraction
review:
Tager is a weird one for sure, only released in Europe and a VERY limited release remote parts of the USA as far as I'm aware. The set itself also has some of the rarest pieces ever made by lego, which is, well, the entire set.

Tager himself was a formidable foe for Nick Bluetooth, and his appearance is captured quite well here in this toy. He's an outlandish alien with popping colors. Not to mention- his left eye, the camera, even moves! 

All around, he's another great addition to the Galidor line. For those willing to pick him up, he'll be a great display piece in any Galidor collection.
